backend/main.mo: Defines backend actor with user profiles, incidents, stalker profiles, evidence files, victim info, police departments, and related CRUD logic using authorization and blob storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Lists three feature requirements modifying messaging and evidence summary behavior and maps each to affected frontend utility files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten one‑line summaries for major frontend files covering pages, components, hooks, and configuration.
frontend/index.css: Defines global CSS variables and light/dark theme tokens plus Tailwind layers for consistent theming.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up the root container and loading the main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app container managing authentication state, profile setup flow, post‑login splash, and routing into authenticated or public views.
frontend/src/components/auth/PostLoginSp: Displays a modal splash screen after login with a random motivational message and a dismiss button.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting first‑time users to enter and save their profile name with basic validation and save handling.
Layout component providing header, footer, settings dialog control, and logout handling with dynamic header height measurement.
frontend/src/components/settings/Setting: Settings modal allowing users to change visual theme, tone style, and language, with saving via backend and immediate theme application.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and managing a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refetching dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity auth flow, loading stored identities, login, logout, and exposing identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, incidents, evidence, stalker profiles, and user settings via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom themes including default dark purple theme and additional variant themes using CSS variables.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, React Query, and Internet Identity provider before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/AuthenticatedApp.tsx: Main authenticated interface with tab navigation, theme application, and URL-hash‑synced routing to workflow pages.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Public landing page handling Internet Identity login, CTA validation, and redirect prep for authenticated workflow.
frontend/src/pages/workflow/EvidenceReco: Drawer showing full evidence details with previews, metadata, and download access.
Evidence listing and upload form allowing users to create, view, and link evidence files to incidents.
frontend/src/pages/workflow/EvidenceSumm: Dialog generating and displaying an evidence summary with tone options and copy/download actions.
frontend/src/pages/workflow/IncidentDeta: Drawer displaying incident details, report info, status, and attached evidence count with copy support.
frontend/src/pages/workflow/IncidentsPag: Displays, filters, and sorts incidents, provides a form to report new incidents, and opens detail and summary views.
frontend/src/pages/workflow/IncidentsSum: Shows a generated summary of all incidents in a dialog with options to copy or download it.
frontend/src/pages/workflow/InstallGuide: Static install instructions for adding the app to iOS, Android, and desktop home screens.
frontend/src/pages/workflow/MessageGener: Generates templated messages based on tone and optional incident references, with copy and SMS‑send options.
frontend/src/pages/workflow/PoliceDepart: Manages personal and verified police departments, supports adding new entries, searching, and submitting reports.
frontend/src/pages/workflow/ResourcesPag: Lists national crime‑help resources with phone numbers and links, plus an emergency call reminder.
frontend/src/pages/workflow/StalkerProfi: Page for viewing and creating stalker profiles, including form handling and save mutations.
frontend/src/pages/workflow/SubmitPolice: Dialog that generates a police report from incidents and evidence, allowing department selection, copy, and download.
frontend/src/pages/workflow/VictimSurviv: Page for viewing, editing, and clearing victim/survivor personal info with blockchain-backed storage.
frontend/src/utils/datetime.ts: Utility functions for formatting timestamps into readable date strings.
frontend/src/utils/download.ts: Utility to download text content as a file using a temporary Blob and link.
frontend/src/utils/files.ts: File validation (size limit) and conversion utilities for reading files into Uint8Array.
frontend/src/utils/generateEvidenceSumma: Generates a text summary of evidence items with tone-specific headers and descriptions.
frontend/src/utils/googleSearch.ts: Opens a new tab with a Google search query built from city, state, and terms.
frontend/src/utils/incidentSummary.ts: Generates a detailed incident summary report including timeline and pattern analysis.
frontend/src/utils/incidentText.ts: Formats a short incident reference string with title and timestamp.
frontend/src/utils/landingCtaRegressionC: Checks whether a CTA button is unobstructed by overlays by testing center and corner clickability, throwing errors or warnings if blocked.
frontend/src/utils/messageGenerator.ts: Generates cease‑and‑desist style messages in varying tones using predefined templates and optional incident references.
frontend/src/utils/policeDeptSaveRegress: Development-only check that warns if a saved police department does not appear in the refreshed list.
frontend/src/utils/policeReport.ts: Builds a formatted police report combining department info, incident summaries, and evidence summaries.
frontend/src/utils/postLoginSplashMessag: Provides a fixed set of motivational, safety-focused post-login messages and a function to return a random one.
frontend/src/utils/smsLink.ts: Creates an SMS deep link with an encoded message and optional phone number, warning if the message is very long.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions including colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Describes the project's current features, design goals, issues, and architectural notes for the women’s safety app.
